name: ACE Dental Software
overview:
ACE Dental Software is a dental practice management software program designed to be so simple that anyone can master it in a few hours.

Founded over 17 years ago, ACE Dental has created a comprehensive program that handles patient and insurance billing, scheduling, restorative and perio charting, recall management, word processing, digital signature documents, lab case tracking, and many other features.The software gives you all the tools you need to work smarter, including a comprehensive set of scheduling, charting, and financial features. ACE continues to develop new ways to offer our customers the latest technology to keep their practices up-to-date.

The new ACE LiveUpdate function will automatically keep users on the latest version. ACE is easy to set up and easy to use. All versions ACE software come with 60-days of 1-800 telephone technical support, a comprehensive manual and context sensitive help screens. If you have high-speed Internet access, our technical support can remotely log onto your computer and assist you in setting up your software. Easily store and retrieve patient information, to and from referral sources, insurance benefits, scanned documents, emails and letters sent, and primary and secondary account billing information.

For scheduling, simply click and drag on an opening to schedule an appointment. Color code your appointment to easily identify your appointment types. For charting, anatomically-accurate, 3-dimensional charting makes posting and treatment planning easy. Point and click to chart existing, actual and planned work. Use Email to communicate to your patients regarding their appointments, treatment plans, or overdue accounts. Start submitting claims to paper immediately after you download ACE. Enrollment with Emdeon is required if you would like to submit electronically. ACE as many reports for you to monitor the pulse of your practice. Because the database is open, we have also included a ReportWriter Tool for instant customized data mining. Manage your hygiene recall as well as other follow ups. Print and track prescriptions easily.
